archimate:ApplicationService.name: Maintain Maintenance Cycles
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Calibration Calibration Process is designed to track calibration due date for tools equipment using Maintenance Plans Notifications are triggered from maintenance plans which signifies that a tool is due for Calibration
Inspection For Inspection process the next inspection due date is tracked from maintenance plans Standard Notification report is used to track tools due for inspection
Link to Training Material (calibration) https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/PRJ-ToolsManagementProject/Shared%20Documents/TS%20Training%20and%20Test%20of%20Solution/WP2%20Asia%20Pacific%20(Not%20Beijing)/Training%20Material/TC61%20-%20Calibration/TC61.01%20Maintain%20Calibration%20Cycles.pptx?d=w09ebc08c3fd24e4997e8d0a7868ecf4b&csf=1&web=1&e=xobYD4
Link to Training Material (inspection) https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/PRJ-ToolsManagementProject/Shared%20Documents/TS%20Training%20and%20Test%20of%20Solution/WP2%20Asia%20Pacific%20(Not%20Beijing)/Training%20Material/TC62%20-%20Conduct%20inspection/TC62.01%20Maintain%20Inspection%20Cycles.pptx?d=w8bcb74207fd24d54b03553eb9b999017&csf=1&web=1&e=cpHo7l
